feed.title: Removing lnd's source code from the Lightning specs repository

entry.title: Removing lnd's source code from the Lightning specs repository
entry.summary: In an email thread, Andr√©s G. Aragoneses expresses agreement with a proposal but asks how to move it forward. Another participant, Bryan, suggests that broken links might be a consideration for not moving forward with the proposal, but believes they can be solved with a soft note in a README. Bryan also includes a link to his Twitter profile.
